attributes.action: Change payments of WTFC directly to Childminders not parents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Working Tax Family Credit is paid to families to help pay towards childcare costs but not all of the money they are given for that purpose is actually used towards childcare costs, resulting in many registered childminders being left unpaid and having to reclaim money owed through the Small Claims Court, despite the non-payment being fraud of the Benefits system. Any money paid to a family for childcare costs should be paid directly to the childminder to prevent this from happening.
